title: Poco M7 5G Google Play Console listing brings us the first image and spec details
description: The Poco M7 Pro 5G launched back in December, and now it's almost time for it to be joined by the Poco M7 5G. The non-Pro model has been listed in the Google Play Console. This has revealed the full-frontal shot you can see below as well as some of its specs. So, the Poco M7 5G is powered by the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC. The listed version has 4GB of RAM, but more options might be available upon launch. The phone has a 720x1640 resolution screen and unfortunately will run Android 14 when it arrives, even though Android 15 has been out for many months now. The M7 5G has decently...
excerpt: The device should join the M7 Pro 5G very soon. The Poco M7 Pro 5G launched back in December, and now it's almost time for it to be joined by the Poco M7...
text: The Poco M7 Pro 5G launched back in December, and now it's almost time for it to be joined by the Poco M7 5G. The non-Pro model has been listed in the Google Play Console. This has revealed the full-frontal shot you can see below as well as some of its specs. So, the Poco M7 5G is powered by the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC. The listed version has 4GB of RAM, but more options might be available upon launch. The phone has a 720x1640 resolution screen and unfortunately will run Android 14 when it arrives, even though Android 15 has been out for many months now. The M7 5G has decently thin bezels at the top and sides of the screen, with a larger chin at the bottom. There's a centrally-placed hole-punch for the selfie camera too. These are all the details that have been outed so far, but with the Google Play Console listing going live we expect the device to become official very soon. Xiaomi Poco M7 Pro 5G Via
html:
The Poco M7 Pro 5G launched back in December, and now it's almost time for it to be joined by the Poco M7 5G. The non-Pro model has been listed in the Google Play Console. This has revealed the full-frontal shot you can see below as well as some of its specs.

So, the Poco M7 5G is powered by the Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC. The listed version has 4GB of RAM, but more options might be available upon launch.

The phone has a 720x1640 resolution screen and unfortunately will run Android 14 when it arrives, even though Android 15 has been out for many months now.

The M7 5G has decently thin bezels at the top and sides of the screen, with a larger chin at the bottom. There's a centrally-placed hole-punch for the selfie camera too.

These are all the details that have been outed so far, but with the Google Play Console listing going live we expect the device to become official very soon.

Xiaomi Poco M7 Pro 5G

Via
